Bullets

Global variables

$nav-bullets-class: "-bullets" !global
$nav-bullets-item: "li" !global
$nav-bullets-item-size: 10px !global

Basic use

Use class -bullets with <ul>. And <small> for sign.

    •

If you want to put your bullets inside some position: relative container, use modifier _fixed_ and position modifiers _left_, _center_, _right_ and _top_, _middle_, _bottom_.

If you want to make your bullets position: fixed (for example like a global navigation with parallax), you'll need to add this style by your own or add style="position: fixed;" to bullets.
